availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Orange County, North Carolina, native. Son of Lewis Edwards and Nancy Edwards. Married to Hannah J. Frederick Edwards in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on November 18, 1859. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 615.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 145-46.
"Hinton Edwards (1839-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial #84870989, accessed December 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84870989.
